content: अंशुः [अंश्-मृग° कु.] {@--1@} A ray, beam of light; चंड°, घर्म° hot-rayed, the sun; सूर्यांशुभिर्भिन्नमिवारविंदं <ls>Ku. 1. 32</ls>; lustre, brilliance; रत्न°, नख° &c. {@--2@} A point or end. {@--3@} A small or minute particle. {@--4@} End of a thread. {@--5@} A filament, especially of the Soma plant (<ab>Ved.</ab>) {@--6@} Garment; decoration. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of a sage or of a prince. {@--8@} Speed, velocity (वेग).
